response.answer_text: No, it is not true. Marshmello likes to trick people and having Shawn collect that award for him was just one of his tricks. Also, later on, Shawn (wearing his Marshmello mask) and the actual Marshmello took a photo together, and that wasn’t even the first time they have both been in a photo together. Another piece of proof as to why Shawn is not the actual Marshmello is that Shawn has a very obvious tattoo on his hand, as you can see in the picture below, which Marshmello does not have on his hand.  All in all, Shawn going up to get Marshmello’s award was just a big joke and he is not the real Marshmello, and, although I can not confirm if this is true, there is a lot of evidence pointing to Chris Comstock being the real Marshmello. I’m not going to get into that here, but a simple YouTube search will come up with many videos of proof if you are interested. Hopefully this helps, sorry for having such a long answer.
